fields.summary: Investigate why ALOY-1641 was not caught by tests/eslint

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description:
Unable to build Hyperloop-examples application using the newest CLI. Following error can be seen.

{code:java}
[ERROR] Error transforming JS file
[ERROR] C:\Users\APPC\Downloads\hyperloop-examples-master\Resources\windows\ios\controls.js: state is not defined
{code}

*Test Steps:*
# Download Hyperloop examples app
# Run the app

*Actual result:*
Above error is shown 

*Expected result:*
Hyperloop app should run without any issues.

comments.body: Another one for the ALOY-1642 bucket
New CLI should be in preprod with this in ~20 minutes from this comment if everything goes well

*Resolving ticket.* Fix verified in CLI Version {{"NPM":"4.2.15","CLI":"7.1.2-master.7"}}. Tested using the Hyperloop-Examples app. 

*Test Environment*
